title: Alice in Wonderland: Part 5: Advice from a caterpillar
des: Alice is beginning to wonder who she is, when a caterpillar gives her some advice about a magical mushroom. But is it good advice – and who thinks Alice is a snake?

title: Alice in Wonderland: Part 4: The White Rabbit's house
des: Alice is too big to fit inside the White Rabbit's house. The problem is, she's already inside it! How does she get out - and why is everyone throwing cakes?

title: Alice in Wonderland: Part 3: The Caucus-race
des: Alice meets all sorts of creatures as she swims around in a pool of her own tears. She joins in a Caucus-race: but how can you win a race with no rules? And who will give the prizes?

title: Alice in Wonderland: Part 2: The pool of tears
des: Alice can't stay the same size for more than a few minutes! When she's big, she cries a pool of tears. What will happen to her when she gets smaller again?

title: Alice in Wonderland: Part 1: Down the rabbit hole
des: Alice is an ordinary girl, until the day a white rabbit runs past her, saying "I'm late!" Alice follows the White Rabbit as he runs down a rabbit hole, and a whole Wonderland of adventures begin…

title: Frankenstein: Episode 10: Melting the ice
des: The Creature reappears in the Arctic and boards the boat which has rescued Viktor Frankenstein

title: Frankenstein: Episode 9: The wedding night
des: Viktor Frankenstein gets married and is happy again. But will it last long?

title: Frankenstein: Episode 8: Jail time
des: There’s another murder and Viktor Frankenstein is arrested

title: Frankenstein: Episode 7: A monster bride
des: Viktor Frankenstein works alone to build a bride for the Creature

title: Frankenstein: Episode 6: Death comes to you
des: The Creature explains the killings and offers to leave everybody in peace, but on one condition...

title: Frankenstein: Episode 5: The milk of human kindness
des: The Creature is on the run and finally meets a good family. Will they accept it?

title: Frankenstein: Episode 4: Creature meets creator
des: Viktor Frankenstein meets the Creature at last. Will they be friends or have a fight?

title: Frankenstein: Episode 3: Death in the family
des: A murder takes Viktor Frankenstein back to his hometown

title: Frankenstein: Episode 2: It's alive!
des: Viktor Frankenstein is ready to give life to a creature, but is this really a wise thing to do?

title: Frankenstein: Episode 1: A passion for science
des: Viktor Frankenstein has always been passionate about science and he and others paid a high price because of that. He has a warning to all who, like him, tried to challenge Nature

title: The White Elephant: Episode 30: Hope
des: The White Elephant restaurant has always struggled to stay in business and the future is not looking good. They desperately need customers - and when they finally get one, Gordon's skills in the kitchen must keep them there. Find out if he can do it in this final episode and learn some hope-related phrases

title: The White Elephant: Episode 29: Competition
des: There's a bake-off competition taking place and Gordon seems to have made a special effort - and he only does that when there's something to win! Peter's also made a cake that looks exactly the same – what's going on? Watch this video to find out, and learn some competition-related phrases

title: The White Elephant: Episode 28: Empathy
des: Ceilia's latest idea from her management training is to get everyone to do a job swap. This will give everyone the chance to see what other people's jobs involve. This could be fun, but will Gordon be able to 'lower' himself to doing the work of a washer-upper?! Watch this to find out and learn some phrases related to empathy.

title: The White Elephant: Episode 27: Fashion
des: Gordon changes his appearance to try and look fashionable but his work colleagues have their own opinions on how he looks and they can't keep a secret. Watch and learn some fashion-related phrases.

title: The White Elephant: Episode 26: Sick
des: What's this? Gordon has come up with a new recipe for ostrich lasagne. He just needs someone to taste-test it. When the team offer to give it a try they soon wish they hadn't!  Watch and count how many phrases you hear related to feeling sick

title: The White Elephant: Episode 25: Brave
des: There's a criminal in the area but could he be coming to eat at The White Elephant and who's going to be the bravest person to confront him? Watch and learn some phrases related to being brave

title: The White Elephant: Episode 24: Honesty
des: Peter the waiter is shaken up when he nearly gets hit by a van but Gordon has no sympathy as he brags about his new mobile business venture. Can the two things be connected? Learn some phrases about honesty.

title: The White Elephant: Episode 23: Sleepy
des: It's been a late night for the team at The White Elephant but Gordon seems remarkably lively. That's until he hears about an award that only he could win! Watch and learn some sleep-related phrases.

title: The White Elephant: Episode 22: Disaster
des: It's a special 'sushi night' at the restaurant and Gordon is keen to make a good impression on the customers. But his best efforts don't quite go to plan and he runs out of an important ingredient. Is the evening going to be a disaster or can someone save the day? Watch and learn phrases used to talk about very unsuccessful events

title: The White Elephant: Episode 21: Clean
des: The restaurant is about to get a visit from the health inspector. Everyone needs to make the place clean and tidy but Gordon has other ideas. And why does he need to clean up his act? Watch the video and listen out for the phrases used to do with being clean

title: The White Elephant: Episode 20: Failure
des: The restaurant gets some customers from America who demand a meal that really puts Gordon's cooking skills to the test. Can he give them what they want or will he leave a bad impression? Find out by watching this episode and listening out for the phrases related to failure

title: The White Elephant: Episode 19: Love
des: Lucky Mary! Someone has left her a special gift and she thinks she knows who it's from but is she right or has someone else in the kitchen got a soft spot for her? Find out in this episode and listen out for the phrases related to love

title: The White Elephant: Episode 18: Excellence
des: A VIP [Very Important Person] has decided to come and eat at The White Elephant and try out the food. Gordon cooks him something really special - but is it what the customer had in mind? Find out in this episode and listen out for phrases related to excellence.

title: The White Elephant: Episode 17: Timing
des: Something smells good in the kitchen – Gordon is preparing a special meal but unfortunately the red wine he's using isn't going into the cooking pot. Will the customers ever get to taste it – and will they want to? Watch this episode and listen out for the phrases related to timing

title: The White Elephant: Episode 16: Calm!
des: Don't panic! Twenty-five people are heading for The White Elephant. Will Gordon really be able to cook for this many people? And how will Peter get all the orders written on his small notepad? Everyone needs to keep calm if they want this to go well. Listen out for the phrases related to keeping calm

title: The White Elephant: Episode 15: Sad
des: Peter, the waiter, isn't happy. Somebody called Edith has died and the team are doing their best to comfort Peter with some wise words. Can grumpy Gordon think of a nice thing to say? And who is Edith anyway? Find out in this episode and listen out for the phrases related to sadness

title: The White Elephant: Episode 14: Clever
des: The White Elephant restaurant is struggling to stay in business. It's up to the staff to think of an idea that will bring in enough money to save the restaurant! But, as usual, their grumpy chef Gordon needs some persuading. What will change his mind? Find out in this episode - and listen out for phrases related to being clever

title: The White Elephant: Episode 13: Resilience
des: The White Elephant restaurant has had so few customers it might have to close down. Ceilia comes up with an idea to attract more diners, but there's one person who's not convinced... Will Gordon the chef change his mind? Find out in this episode and listen out for the phrases related to resilience that are used.

title: The White Elephant: Episode 12: Shock!
des: When Mary and Ceilia arrive early for work they get the shock of their lives when they discover Gordon sleeping in the kitchen. What's caused him to spend the night there? Find out in this episode and listen out for shock-related phrases

title: The White Elephant: Episode 11: Success
des: What is the secret of Gordon's success? Even when Mary gets an important qualification, he claims his experience is much more important. However, something happens which proves who has the most experience. Who will succeed?

title: The White Elephant: Episode 10: Angry
des: Gordon, the chef, is usually an angry man but something in the kitchen has made him angrier than usual. Who can calm him down and get him cooking again before another customer disappears?

title: The White Elephant: Episode 9: Secrets
des: Ceilia, the boss, has some news she can't keep to herself but as soon as she tells someone the news spreads. However, as the secret gets passed on, the information becomes less reliable. Find out what the secret is in today's episode

title: The White Elephant: Episode 8: Lucky
des: Gordon is preparing something special for the customers but there's one ingredient that might not be to everybody's taste. Find out what happens and see why Mary's washing-up skills come in very useful

title: The White Elephant: Episode 7: Late!
des: Oh no, there are three customers in the restaurant and no chef to cook any food. While Peter panics, Ceilia tries to find a solution and Mary helps get the kitchen ready. But when Gordon finally turns up, will there be any customers to cook any food for? Find out in this episode

title: The White Elephant: Episode 6: Kindness
des: Peter's just had a nice surprise - his first ever tip - but he doesn't hold on to it for long. Gordon the chef gets a surprise too, when everyone realises what's happened to Peter's money. Watch this episode to find out what makes Gordon grumpy this time - and listen out for phrases related to kindness

title: The White Elephant: Episode 5: Happy
des: Welcome back to the kitchen of The White Elephant restaurant. Gordon is unusually happy. What's making him so cheerful - and how long will it last? Watch and learn some useful everyday phrases related to being happy

title: The White Elephant: Episode 4: Annoyed
des: The kitchen of The White Elephant restaurant is a busy place and Gordon the chef doesn't like it. Watch and learn some useful everyday phrases related to being annoyed

title: The White Elephant: Episode 3: Broken
des: Find out what's going on in the kitchen of The White Elephant restaurant. There's a problem with the cooker and Gordon the chef isn't happy. Watch and learn some useful everyday phrases related to things that are broken

title: The White Elephant: Episode 2: Quick!
des: Welcome back to The White Elephant. The staff at the restaurant are still waiting for their first customer, but when one eventually arrives they have to work quickly to make sure this one doesn't escape

title: The White Elephant: Episode 1: Panic!
des: Welcome to The White Elephant - the restaurant with no customers. How will they cope when someone finally comes for a meal?

title: Gulliver's Travels: Part 10: The journey's end
des: Can Gulliver remain in the land of the horses he loves so much?

title: Gulliver's Travels: Part 9: In the land of the houyhnhnms
des: Gulliver finds himself on an island of talking horse-people

title: Gulliver's Travels: Part 8: Horrible science
des: Gulliver visits the Great Academy of Lagado

title: Gulliver's Travels: Part 7: Island in the sky
des: Gulliver has left the giants of Brobdingnag behind and begun a new adventure. An attack by pirates leaves him alone on an empty island, until something huge appears in the sky…

title: Gulliver's Travels: Part 6: Gunpowder
des: Gulliver is in the land of the giants, Brobdingnag. He fears for his life and wants to return home to England. But first, he'll have to persuade the King to let him go

title: Gulliver's Travels: Part 5: Palace of the giants
des: Gulliver is in the land of the giants, Brobdingnag. He is forced to perform every day in front of crowds of villagers, but his luck changes when a visitor from the royal palace arrives.

title: Gulliver's Travels: Part 4: Voyage to Brobdingnag
des: After his adventures in the land Lilliput, Gulliver takes to sea again. This time he arrives in a country where he's not the largest, but the smallest... What will happen in the land of Brobdingnag?

title: Gulliver's Travels: Part 3: Treachery and treason
des: Gulliver is a hero after helping Lilliput defeat their enemy Blefuscu. But when fire breaks out at the palace, can Gulliver help?

title: Gulliver's Travels: Part 2: War with Blefuscu
des: Gulliver goes to war against Lilliput's enemies

title: Gulliver's Travels: Part 1: Voyage to Lilliput
des: Gulliver arrives in the land of Lilliput

title: The Importance of Being Earnest, Part 10: The real Ernest is discovered
des: All is revealed in the final episode

title: The Importance of Being Earnest, Part 9: A reunion and a death
des: Lady Bracknell makes a surprise appearance

title: The Importance of Being Earnest, Part 8: The truth about Ernest
des: It's time for the men to admit they're not called Ernest

title: The Importance of Being Earnest, Part 7: The Misunderstanding
des: Cecily and Gwendolen both think they're engaged to someone called Ernest

title: The Importance of Being Earnest, Part 6: Cecily's confession
des: Algernon and Cecily's relationship takes an interesting twist

title: The Importance of Being Earnest, Part 5: Jack meets Ernest
des: Jack returns home to find his friend Algernon there. Algernon's pretending to be Jack's brother so he can win Cecily's heart

title: The Importance of Being Earnest, Part 4: A visit from Ernest
des: Algernon secretly goes to visit Cecily. He's pretending to be Jack's wicked younger brother, Ernest

title: The Importance of Being Earnest, Part 3: Lost and found
des: Jack has proposed to his darling Gwendolen, and she has accepted. But her mother is not happy.

title: The Importance of Being Earnest, Part 2: The Proposal
des: Algernon and Jack reveal they both lead double lives. But can Jack win the heart of the woman he really loves?

title: The Importance of Being Earnest, Part 1: Earnest or Ernest?
des: A young man visits his wealthy, young friend in Victorian London. But he's not exactly who he says he is…

title: Jamaica Inn: Part 10: The truth is out
des: The Vicar of Altarnum knows the awful truth about who killed Mary's uncle and aunt. She has a dangerous journey ahead now, but help comes from an unexpected place.

title: Jamaica Inn: Part 9: The Vicar of Altarnum
des: Mary has gone to vicar's house. She wants to talk to him about the murder of her uncle but he's not there. But later he arrives and he has some important news to tell her. What can it be?

title: Jamaica Inn: Part 8: A shocking discovery
des: After the shocking events on the coast, Mary's uncle is now planning to escape from Jamaica Inn. He fears that someone is coming to kill him – someone who has been giving him the orders to wreck ships.  She has to escape first to tell someone what she has seen but who can she trust?

title: Jamaica Inn: Part 7: Shipwreck
des: Mary has been forced by her Uncle Joss to travel with him and his drunken men on Christmas Eve. She fell asleep but she's about to wake up and discover what Joss and his gang of bad men really get up to at night.

title: Jamaica Inn: Part 6: The horse market
des: Following Mary's uncle's shocking confession - how he lures ships onto the rocks and drowns women and children - she escapes from the Inn and goes with his brother, Jem, to the horse market in Launceston. But things don't go to plan.

title: Jamaica Inn: Part 5: Lost on the moor
des: Joss has returned to Jamaica Inn and is very angry about Mr Bassat's visit. He storms out of the house and sets off across the moor. Mary decides to follow him.

title: Jamaica Inn: Part 4: The horse thief
des: Mary finds herself attracted to a visitor to Jamaica Inn. But who is he - and can he be trusted? Meanwhile, another visitor discovers some suspicious objects in an upstairs room...

title: Jamaica Inn: Part 3: Strange goings-on
des: Mary has to work in the bar of Jamaica Inn on Saturday night. She gets to meet a group of rough and drunk men. Later that night there are some strange goings-on in the yard outside. What's happening - and why are people talking about murder?

title: Jamaica Inn: Part 2: A cold and lonely place
des: Mary arrives at Jamaica Inn and meets her Aunt Patience and Uncle Joss. Immediately she discovers what a mean and scary man her uncle is. He sets the rules and tells her what to do. On her second day there she discovers a locked room – what is inside?

title: Jamaica Inn: Part 1: Meet Mary Yellan
des: When Mary's mother dies, she goes to live with her aunt and uncle who run the Jamaica Inn.  It lies in a remote and bleak corner of England. On her journey there she is warned to keep away. But why?

title: Alice in Wonderland: Part 10: Alice's evidence
des: Alice is at the trial of the Knave of Hearts - and she is taller than ever before. The King asks the jury to give their verdict - but will the Queen let Alice escape without a punishment?

title: Alice in Wonderland: Part 9: Who stole the tarts?
des: Alice finds herself at a trial. Did the Knave of Hearts steal the Queen's tarts? What does the Hatter know about it - and what's that funny feeling Alice is having?

title: Alice in Wonderland: Part 8: Croquet with the Queen
des: Alice plays croquet with the Queen. But what are the rules - and how can Alice play croquet when the ball is a hedgehog?

title: Alice in Wonderland: Part 7: A mad tea-party
des: Alice finds the Hatter and the March Hare having a very strange tea-party. They manage to make Alice angry - but how? And do riddles always have answers?

title: Alice in Wonderland: Part 6: Pig and Pepper
des: Someone inside the Duchess's house is angry - but who? The Duchess's baby is making some very strange sounds and the Cheshire-Cat smiles while the cook throws things. Will Alice meet anyone who isn't mad?

title: Alice in Wonderland: Part 5: Advice from a caterpillar
des: Alice is beginning to wonder who she is, when a caterpillar gives her some advice about a magical mushroom. But is it good advice – and who thinks Alice is a snake?

title: Alice in Wonderland: Part 4: The White Rabbit's house
des: Alice is too big to fit inside the White Rabbit's house. The problem is, she's already inside it! How does she get out - and why is everyone throwing cakes?

title: Alice in Wonderland: Part 3: The Caucus-race
des: Alice meets all sorts of creatures as she swims around in a pool of her own tears. She joins in a Caucus-race: but how can you win a race with no rules? And who will give the prizes?

title: Alice in Wonderland: Part 2: The pool of tears
des: Alice can't stay the same size for more than a few minutes! When she's big, she cries a pool of tears. What will happen to her when she gets smaller again?

title: Alice in Wonderland: Part 1: Down the rabbit hole
des: Alice is an ordinary girl, until the day a white rabbit runs past her, saying "I'm late!" Alice follows the White Rabbit as he runs down a rabbit hole, and a whole Wonderland of adventures begin…

title: A Christmas Carol - ep 05 - The end of it
des: Ebenezer Scrooge has been taken to several different places by three spirits. He saw that if he died, nobody would care because he is a bad man. How will this experience change Scrooge's life?

title: A Christmas Carol - ep 04 - The third of three spirits
des: Ebenezer Scrooge is getting used to the company of ghosts, but here's one he doesn't expect.

title: A Christmas Carol - ep 03 - The second of three spirits
des: Ebenezer Scrooge seems to be changing his ways. He has learnt a lesson from a ghost which took him to the past and now is ready to be visited by the Spirit of Christmas Present.

title: A Christmas Carol - ep 02 - The first of three spirits
des: Selfish businessman Ebenezer Scrooge receives a visit from the first of three spirits. This is the Spirit of Christmas Past.

title: A Christmas Carol - ep 01 - Marley's ghost
des: In this episode, you'll get to know Ebenezer Scrooge. Nobody seems to be able to get a kind word or even a smile out of him.
